participant_1.background:
I like to watch Seinfeld and It's Always Sunny in Philadelphia while on my boat.
i have lots of friends.
I found a hidden cave in the mountains while hiking with my dogs.
I like to read diabetes blogs to learn about new ways to control my condition.
I'm a teacher and I'm looking for a way to satisfy my hunger so that I can continue teaching my students.

participant_2.background:
My favorite place to eat is at home because I can control the ingredients and create my own unique recipes.
i thought of joining the military when i was younger.
i am an accountant.
i love to play tennis.
i have 10 alpacas.

content.text: I want to eat some delicious food.
I love to cook! I could make you some fresh pasta.
That sounds wonderful! I like to cook as well. I love to make fresh pasta, too.
I like to make it from scratch. It's so much better than the store bought stuff.
I agree! It's so much more flavorful.
I love to make different types of pasta. I've made lasagna, spaghetti, and ravioli.
I've made all of those, too. I've even made gnocchi.
Gnocchi is so good! I love the potato flavor.
Me too! It's such a delicious and hearty dish.
I'm glad we agree. We should make pasta together sometime!
That would be so much fun! I'd love to cook with you.
Great! We can plan a day to cook together.
